group7.tcss450.uw.edu.centipedeandroid.game

Class CentipedeBody

  • java.lang.Object
    • group7.tcss450.uw.edu.centipedeandroid.game.CentipedeBody

  • public class CentipedeBody
extends java.lang.Object
    CentipedeBody class that acts as a node class that tracks the next node and also keeps track of the nodes position on the screen. Created by addison on 1/24/2017.

      • CentipedeBody

        public CentipedeBody(android.graphics.Bitmap bitImage,
                     int xPos,
                     int yPos,
                     int screenX,
                     int screenY,
                     int block)
        Constructor for CentipedeBody. Initializes variable.
        Parameters:
        bitImage - The bitimage used for the node.
        xPos - The X position of the node.
        yPos - The Y position of the node.
        screenX - The X dimensions of the parent activity.
        screenY - The Y dimensions of the parent activity.
        block - is the block sie of the centipedebody.

      • setEast

        Method that sets the direction east for movement.
        Parameters:
        east - a boolean true or false if the body moves east.

      • update

        public void update()
        Update method that controls the centipedebody movement. Uses booleans to control whether or not the centipede is traveling east or west.
